aber.dcs.cs22510.clg11.gui

Class GUIPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • aber.dcs.cs22510.clg11.gui.GUIPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class GUIPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Contains the GUI elements accessed by the user to interact with the application. Allows the user to select entrants and nodes. Enter a new time (or use system time) and then submit this new time to the log file. Any problems that occur will be displayed to the user.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • GUIPanel

        public GUIPanel(Datastore newData)
        Constructor to instantiate a new GUIPanel. Takes the two classes passed from GUIFrame as parameters to allow panel to acccess shared data store and loading facilities.
        Parameters:
        newData - Datastore object passed down from GUIFrame.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllEntrants

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getAllEntrants()
        Obtains a list of all the entrant names to populate selection box. Accesses them from the array list of entrants contained within Datastore.
        Returns:
        Arraylist of all the entrant's names.

      • getAllCheckpoints

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getAllCheckpoints()
        Obtains a list of all the checkpoints ONLY to populate the CP selection box. Accesses them from the array list of nodes contained within Datastore.
        Returns:
        Arraylist of all the nodes that are CHECKPOINTS.

      • getNode

        public Node getNode(int nodeNo)
        Attempts to fetch a specific node denoted by the node number selected from the drop-down GUI box. If such a node cannot be found, NULL us returned.
        Parameters:
        nodeNo - The number of the selected node.
        Returns:
        The located node or NULL.

      • submitCheckpoint

        public void submitCheckpoint()
        Submits a new time log based on user input within the GUI and determines if an time file currently exists, or if a new one has to be created.

      • updateTimeLog

        public void updateTimeLog()
        Takes the user input and processes the new time log entry before adding it to the times log file.

      • updateStatus

        public void updateStatus(java.lang.String updateMessage,
                boolean isError)
        Displays system status/error messages to the user via the GUI.
        Parameters:
        updateMessage - The message to be displayed.
        isError - Determines whether the message is an error or not.

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt)
        Listener for actions from sub-panel components, to allow operations to be run when components are interacted with.
        Specified by:
        actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
        Parameters:
        evt - - ActionEvent called from components in the panels that require an action to be performed.
